messages:
Name: Rafa
Nationality: Portugal
Date of Birth: May 17, 1993
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Benfica
Primeira Liga clubs played for: Sporting Braga, Benfica

Midfielder Rafa plays for Benfica and has played in the vast majority of the club's Primeira Liga matches in 2020/2021, making 29 appearances overall and accumulating 2,191 minutes of playing time. He has been selected in the starting XI in 27 of these appearances across their 34 fixtures and entered as a substitute on two occasions.

The last time that Rafa featured in the league came on May 15 for Benfica against Sporting CP; a game that he played only eight minutes in during a 4-3 win. The midfielder has netted five Primeira Liga goals this season,. He has amassed three yellow cards.
It was versus Paços de Ferreira on April 10 when Rafa last scored, netting in a 5-0 win. His opening goal of the campaign came in the 5-1 victory against Famalicão on September 18.
Rafa played 25 Primeira Liga games last season for Benfica, scored seven goals and provided five assists.
Before joining Benfica in August 2016, Rafa made 88 league appearances in total at Sporting Braga, scoring 13 goals.
